concept.title: Object Snap Restrictions
concept.shortdesc: With the object snap on, you can snap objects only visible on the screen, including objects on locked layers, layout viewport boundaries, and polyline segments. You cannot snap to objects that are not visible, including objects that are not displayed, objects on turned-off or frozen layers, or the blank portions of dashed lines.

conbody.p: The object snap is available only when you are prompted to specify a point. There isn't any information about object snap displayed if you try to use an object snap at the Command prompt.
